Artificial intelligence is a

Think artificial intelligence (AI) is still a dream of the future? Think again. It's here, and it's all around us.

But not in a creepy way. Most of us just don't realize that many of the tools, apps, gadgets, and services that have made our everyday lives so much easier and more convenient over the past decade are actually powered by artificial intelligence.

Take a trip with us to learn how AI is shaping everything from communications to housekeeping.
